title: Can't Open LoL Client
body: When I try to open the client, the old client screen (screen that was there when you were patching with launch at the top center in orange and LoL in the top left) popped up. When I pressed launch, it disappears with the sound but nothing happens. For some reason my shortcut on my homescreen is still the old LoL logo, the one with the blue square and when my client was open in my task bar it was a blank sheet

replies.body: Ahhhhh it sounds like you're trying to launch League using the old client shortcut. If you goto your install directory (should be C:\Riot Games\League of Legends by default) and make a new shortcut using the LeagueClient app, you should be good to go!

I went to the League of Legends file but I only see lol.launcher and lol.launcher.admin with the old logo There is a LeagueClient but when  I try to open it it says it can't run on my PC and to check with the software publisher
